item.title: Today’s Wordle #1671: Hints and Answer for January 15, 2026
item.content:encoded:
Wordle challenges players to guess a fresh five-letter word each day in six tries or fewer. Whether you’re a beginner or a daily player, today’s tips and strategies can help you solve it faster and maintain your streak—if you’re open to a little extra help. So, if you’ve found yourself stuck with today’s Wordle, don’t worry, below you’ll find some helpful hints and even the answer for Wordle Game #1671 for January 15, 2026

To play today’s Wordle, head to the game’s website. If you want to go right to today’s answer without any tips or tricks, you can click right here.

IMPORTANT: The following information includes spoilers on today’s and yesterday’s editions of Wordle. If you don’t want the answer given to you, stop scrolling.

How To Play Wordle

Wordle is a simple but addictive word puzzle. Each day, players have to guess a five-letter word answer in no more than six attempts. After each guess:

  • Green letters are correct and in the right position.
  • Yellow letters are correct, but in the wrong position.
  • Gray letters are not in the word at all.

The goal is to guess the word in as few tries as possible. Daily puzzles keep players coming back for more, making it a fun brain exercise and a popular online trend.

Wordle can only be played on the New York Times website. There is currently no app for you to download the official game.

Wordle Hints For Today, January 15, 2026

The Wordle answer for game #1671 might give you a bit of a challenge.. According to the NY Times Wordle review, today’s answer takes an average of 4.3 of 6 guesses. That makes it over a full guess harder than the 3-guess average from January 13.

General Wordle Hints For January 15

Without giving today’s Wordle answer completely away, here are a few helpful hints for today to get you started:

  • Hint 1: This word is often used literally and figuratively.
  • Hint 2: It commonly appears in writing about separation or division.
  • Hint 3: You’ll see it used to describe both physical spaces and abstract gaps.
  • Hint 4: The word frequently shows up in dramatic or descriptive prose rather than casual speech.

Use these clues to narrow down your guesses and increase your chances of solving Wordle #1671 for January 15, 2026.

Starter Words For January 15, 2026

If you want help getting started without having today’s Wordle answer given to you, there are a few starter words worth trying that will help you figure out some included letters. A few starter words that may help are:

  • MARCH
  • SMACK
  • CHAOS
  • MATCH

Today’s Wordle Answer For Game #1671 On January 15, 2026

If you’ve tried everything, including using the above hints, and are still stuck, you can find the answer to today’s Wordle below.

Answer: CHASM

If you solved today’s Wordle without our answer, congratulations! If not, take note of the best tips above for tomorrow’s puzzle, and check back daily for more hints.

What Does Today’s Wordle Answer Mean?

CHASM is a noun that means “a yawning fissure or deep cleft in the earth’s surface; gorge.”

Yesterday’s Wordle Answer

If you missed the previous game, here’s yesterday’s Wordle answer for Game #1670 on January 14, 2026

Answer: AVOID

While not always the case, looking at previous words can sometimes give you insight into common patterns or letter usage in Wordle puzzles.

When Is The Next Wordle Game After #1671?

Wordle games are updated daily at 12 am or Midnight in your respective time zone. Information about the next game is often available in the hours before to give players a heads up. The game on January 16 will be Wordle Game #1672.

What Is Wordle?

Wordle is a daily word puzzle created by Josh Wardle. Initially developed as a prototype in 2013, it wasn’t fully released until 2021. The game challenges players to guess a five-letter word in six tries or fewer, using hints from each attempt to narrow down the answer. Its straightforward concept, accessibility, and the thrill of solving a new puzzle each day helped it surge in popularity by late 2021. The success of Wordle inspired numerous spin-offs and social media challenges, leading to its acquisition by The New York Times in early 2022.

item.title: Alleged Screenshot Reveals Forza Horizon 6 Release Date
item.content:encoded:
Ahead of next week’s Xbox Developer Direct, the Forza Horizon 6 release date may have been leaked. An alleged screenshot has made its way online that appears to show when players will get their hands on the next installment in the popular racing series.

Early Wednesday morning, Xbox Infinite posted the screenshot online that says that the Forza Horizon 6 Premium Edition will open up for players on May 15. With the ability to “play 4 days early”, that would suggest a Tuesday, May 19 release.

What Else Is Coming With Forza Horizon 6?

In addition to the early access release date, the image, which looks like an ad for the game, mentions other features for those who buy the Premium Edition. Those include:

  • VIP Membership
  • Welcome Pack
  • Car Pass
  • Time Attack Car Pack
  • Italian Passion Car Pack (coming post-launch)
  • 2 Premium Expansions (coming post-launch)

Players will also get a “pre-tuned and exclusive” Ferrari J50 if they preorder the game.

Forza Horizon 6 was first announced in September at Tokyo Game Show. The game heads to Japan for the first time, and will feature more than 550 cars in what is being labeled as “Forza Horizon’s biggest open world driving adventure yet”.

As always, none of this has been confirmed by Xbox or Playground Games, nor has it been independently verified by Insider Gaming. Until that happens, please take the information with a grain of salt.

The first look at gameplay for the upcoming racing title will come during the aforementioned Xbox Developer Direct showcase on January 22 at 1pm ET/6pm GMT. Insider Gaming will have full coverage of the event and bring you all of the latest details.
